page.title: 17CHILDREN'S LEISURE,TELFORD
page.content:
{Non-organised leisure activities of {31 children.
{Playing out. ******************* 19 {Ball Games **************** 16 {Handicrafts ************** 14 {Collections ************* 13 {Reading ************ 12 {Running ************ 12 {Walking the dog********* 09 {Rollerskating ********* 09 {Swimming ******** 08 {Fishing ****** 06 {Computer games ****** 06 {Bike riding ***** 05 {Ice skating} {* 01} All the children questioned divided their leisure time between a variety of organised and non-organised activities.Non-organised activities proved the most popular,particularly those involving play with friends.
